TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit GacInstalled extends System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase implements class System.Security.Policy.IIdentityPermissionFactory
Public NotInheritable Class GacInstalled Inherits EvidenceBase Implements IIdentityPermissionFactory
public ref class GacInstalled sealed : System::Security::Policy::EvidenceBase, System::Security::Policy::IIdentityPermissionFactory
type GacInstalled = class inherit EvidenceBase interface IIdentityPermissionFactory

Docs.summary: Confirms that a code assembly originates in the global assembly cache (GAC) as evidence for policy evaluation. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The presence of <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled> evidence produces a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermission> in the grant set. If there is a <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A> for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermission>, the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermission> that corresponds to the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled> evidence is compared with the demanded permission.
## Examples The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled> class.
[!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.Gac#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Gac/CPP/gac.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.Gac#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Gac/CS/gac.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.Gac#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.Gac/VB/gac.vb#1)]

abstract member CreateIdentityPermission : System.Security.Policy.Evidence -> System.Security.IPermission override this.CreateIdentityPermission : System.Security.Policy.Evidence -> System.Security.IPermission

Docs.param: The from which to construct the identity permission.
Docs.summary: Creates a new identity permission that corresponds to the current object.
Docs.returns: A new identity permission that corresponds to the current object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.GacIdentityPermission> can be used to determine whether the calling code is in the global assembly cache.
## Examples The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled.CreateIdentityPermission%2A> method. This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled> class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled> objects have no properties to distinguish one from another, so all <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled> objects are equal.
## Examples The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled.Equals%2A> method. This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Policy.GacInstalled> class.
